name: author-speak-before
value: Greetings to everyone coming from Backdrop Build or the internet at large! Today, I'm going to share CodeVideo, the product I've been hacking away at for the past 4 weeks for Backdrop Build.

name: author-speak-before
value: The world can always use more smileys, right?

name: author-speak-before
value: Anyway, all you have to do to try out our product is head over to codevideo.io slash A-I:

name: author-speak-before
value: And one thing before you go - believe it or not, this isn't Chris speaking at all! This is our CLI tool, codevideo A-I running before your eyes! We've really reached the uncanny valley, haven't we?
